name: vitepress-lite-monorepo
description: A lightweight VitePress-inspired documentation platform with API backend and AI service

scripts.dev:ai: cd packages/ai-service && poetry run ai-service serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.ai:migrate: cd packages/ai-service && poetry run ai-service migrate
scripts.ai:ingest: cd packages/ai-service && poetry run ai-service ingest
scripts.ai:ingest-clear: cd packages/ai-service && poetry run ai-service ingest --clear
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
